::Perndabot/Galaxor::

Perndabot watches Biomass for any sign of an attack, hearing Galaxor 
behind him and deciding not to reply. Perndabot draws two large 
swords.

"Allright. No guns, simply swords and knives. If you don't follow the 
rules, you'll be scrapped and used as spare parts. Got that?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Galaxor watches the two bots below him, hoping that Perndabot would 
lose so that he could get in on the action.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> 
> 
> * Biomass settled himself and crossed his arms across his chest-
plate as he 
> keeps his eyes on Perndabot, a smile playing across his lips.
> Nue'e looked from Perndabot to Biomass and back again, sighing and 
glancing 
> over towards Swift, wondering what she thought of all this.
> But Nue'e sucks her arms to her chest and closes her eyes in 
surprise when 
> Supernova runs by her, looking at him but then jumping in surprise 
then all 
> of the other Galactors run by her, hearing a whistle and knowing 
from 
> instinkt what it meant.
> Biomass returns Perndabot's glair, not moving from his spot but 
looking 
> towards the new bots in the sceen as he hears one of them whistle 
at Nue'e, 
> lifting a brow in her direction to see what her reaction to all 
this 
> excitement was. And all he saw was a rather disturbed fembot.
> He looked back to Perndabot, not even looking up as the Galactors 
come 
> together but gives them a look that says" give me a break here!" 
when they 
> offer to pound him into the dust if Perndabot failed.
> Biomass then lifted a brow at Perndabot.*
> 
> " Your move."
